keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Dodd-Frank’s Title II provision for the broker-dealers, also known as “orderly liquidation authority,” has always been a bit confusing.

headline.print_headline: Sorting Out Dodd-Frank’s Treatment of Failed Broker-Dealers
headline.main: Sorting Out Dodd-Frank’s Treatment of Failed Broker-Dealers

snippet: Dodd-Frank’s Title II provision for the broker-dealers, also known as “orderly liquidation authority,” has always been a bit confusing.
